item.description:
"Tango, Tarot and Tinis" We get the lights soft and sexy - then all you beautiful guests enter for a sexy south american glimpse of the tango world, to learn, to dance and to meet. Visit with Beth Prins Tarot reader for a mini TAROT reading, have an exotic drink,learn the tango,then dance and mingle. Life is grand, lets enjoy our meeting. This is going to be a vogue-ish party night featuring the argentine tango practice, workshop & demos, social dancing. Its a Friday night lets enjoy. All are welcome. dress your best- or chic 1040's Bringing old world and culture to downtown Stamford and fun.

 iF YOU have a special South American wine you want to share bring it -it will help as this is more intimate special  party- I have posted it with other groups so the attendees are limited

Tickets pre-reserved- $30 OR at the door $35

you can also send checks to

 Contact MARIA FIORA

201 Summer Street

Stamford,CT 06901

CALLL  203-353-4363

 TO RESERVE YOUR TICKET by 3/12 AND if you want an appointment for a mini Tarot with Beth.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: TANGO TAROT AND TINIS
